product_name: Louis Garneau Tri Lite Bike Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featherweight and fast at transitions, the men's Louis Garneau Tri Lite Bike Shoes deliver the power transfer needed by competitive triathletes. Synthetic-leather/polyurethane uppers. Closure has reversed rip-and-stick tab for fast transition. X-Lite carbon-fiberglass outsoles are stiff and super lightweight. HRS-90 heel retention system maintains heel positioning and reduces loss of power. Stretchy nonslip unidirectional Lycra(R) helps keep heels in place. Louis Garneau Tri Lite Bike Shoes weigh in at just over 8 oz. each. Closeout.
short_description: Featherweight and fast at transitions, the men's Louis Garneau Tri Lite Bike Shoes deliver the power transfer needed by competitive triathletes.
